message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the value of the product,  $11,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm happy to buy it for $9,500.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product. Let's make this happen!

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $10,500 is still a little more than I'm hoping to spend.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  This is my final offer, and if it doesn't work for you, I'll need to go with John's offer.
